channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Japan’s Present and Future National Security Strategy: Five Key Challenges to Watch
item.description: As Japan’s new leadership considers revising its national security strategy, it faces questions related to funding, domestic politics, spending priorities, indigenous production, and U.S.-Japan alliance cooperation.

item.title: Chinese Energy Investments in Southeast Asia
item.description: With the Trump administration revoking Biden-era programs to support energy transitions in Southeast Asia, there is a widening funding gap that China is poised to fill.
